text:
apr-1.4.5 on recent MinGW on Windows 7.

configure --enable-shared --prefix=/mingw
make

No .dll is produced.
creator: yuri@tsoft.com
yuri@tsoft.com
text: This PR may be related to this patch checked in recently: https://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=46175

creator: trawick@apache.org
text:
Yes, 46175 is the PR to track that; the changes are in trunk now and I plan to backport to the 1.4.x branch for 1.4.6.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 46175 ***
